text: A spaghetti spoon is a kitchen utensil that you use to serve spaghetti or other types of pasta. It consists of a handle with a deep parte with tines and holes. The spaghetti spoon is used to facilitate the effortless turning of pasta inside a pot of boiling water and also helps prevent the pasta from slipping off the spoon while serving. Help drain excess water and keep hands dry. The holes in the design enables efficient portioning. Category:Food utensils
title: Spaghetti spoon
